snippet: The world must pressure China to honor its promise of democracy.
abstract: Op-Ed article by democracy advocate Martin Lee describes scene at Hong Kong protests and perseverance of city's citizens in fighting for democracy and human rights; holds protest represents last stand in defense of Hong Kong's core values, including rule of law, press freedom and judicial independence; calls for world to stand with city in its demands for rights promised by Beijing.
lead_paragraph: The world must pressure China to honor its promise of democracy.

headline.main: Who Will Stand With Hong Kong?
headline.print_headline: Who Will Stand With Hong Kong?

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
